name: UFO RAMPAGE
description:
A game created in the spirit of Rampage, but you are a UFO! Enter the atmosphere and lay waste to the city! Abduct your enemies and process them into raw points! Upgrade your UFO and see how long you can handle the endless onslaught of inferior forces!

Controls:

WASD for movement

Left click to use your active tool

Scroll to switch between tools

Space to call the mothership to return to the store

M to mute the game

...

HONEST PLAYERS LOOK AWAY: Pressing P will enter/exit the store page instantly, and O will give you 1000 points.

...

Game made by Chad Weigel

Follow me elsewhere for other games, music, and art!
